text: the advantage of having a language class
together with the cooking class is that
well when you do something um in
practice um it really helps to solidify
your theoretical knowledge um so one of
the examples is the pronunciation there
are um many words that are difficult to
pronounce for English speaking students
uh one of them is the combination of
letters g l i which is y so what we did
in class instead of telling them look g
l i has to be
pronounced we learn how to say garlic
which is
Alo
L and then outside of the kitchen every
time that we would find a word with this
combination of letters g l
i if either the student remembered and
if they didn't remember I just had to
show them garlic and then they would
know yeah ha this is how you pronounce
it so I think that's one of the big
advantages of having a practical side of
your language class
